user_stories.title: As a user, I want to project setup & environment configuration
user_stories.description: Initialize new project repository, set up development, staging, and production environments, and configure CI/CD pipelines.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Project Setup & Environment Configuration
Then Initialize new project repository, set up development, staging, and production environments, and configure CI/CD pipelines.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to data integration - crm api connection
user_stories.description: Develop and implement secure API connections to the existing CRM system to retrieve necessary data for the dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Data Integration - CRM API Connection
Then Develop and implement secure API connections to the existing CRM system to retrieve necessary data for the dashboard.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to database schema design & implementation
user_stories.description: Design and implement the database schema to store processed CRM data efficiently for dashboard consumption.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Database Schema Design & Implementation
Then Design and implement the database schema to store processed CRM data efficiently for dashboard consumption.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to basic data etl & storage
user_stories.description: Implement an initial Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) process to pull data from the CRM API, process it, and store it in the dashboard's database.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Basic Data ETL & Storage
Then Implement an initial Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) process to pull data from the CRM API, process it, and store it in the dashboard's database.
